groups.name: Wanker Crew
groups.desc: A group of silly white gamer guys. They're all comedic and funny, but oftentimes very rude. It's mostly a part of their comedy style, but it doesn't always come off as comedic.

groups.name: Highschool
groups.desc: People from my highschool, not a lot more to note. Some friends I've had the longest

groups.name: Bitches
groups.desc: A ragtag group of bitches. Very funny, built upon bedwars and making fun of eachother. But when push comes to shove, very supportive, making it different from Wanker Crew.

groups.name: TDD
groups.desc: A large very LGBTQ+ focused group of gamers and artists and such. I've never really felt a part of this community, it seems scary as there are so many different people and I'm scared to misgender them or offend them in any other way

groups.name: CanadaðŸ¤¢
groups.desc: A small group of canadians who know eachother irl and play roblox sometimes

groups.name: Misc
groups.desc: Anyone who doesn't belong to a group, or is in a group that I don't have other friends from

friends.name: Hanna
friends.desc: A bitchy woman who likes joking around and competing over the smallest things. Simultaneously my best friend and support.
friends.them:
+ Very nice to me when genuine
+ Very mean to me when joking

friends.name: Tori
friends.desc: An aspiring singer who likes to check up on me and make sure I'm okay. Super sweet, interested in making music together. Not apart of any major events in my life
friends.them:
+ Very nice to me
+ Fun to be silly with
- Canadian ðŸ¤¢ðŸ¤¢ðŸ¤¢
- Sometimes a little invasive

friends.name: Annalise
friends.desc: Snowie is a funny girl, she plays into a lot of strange jokes which makes her extremely fun to be around. She is also just genuinely nice, gives me attention and makes me feel good about myself
friends.them: + Funny, plays into strange jokes sometimes

friends.name: Max
friends.desc: Max is a comedic friend, I don't know him on a personal level, but we remain good buddies where we just laugh around with eachother about horrible things. We often pretend to be super homophobic conservatives, and it's really fun.
friends.them:
+ Funny
+ Great character
- Says some genuinely weird stuff sometimes
+ Very easy to make me smile at just how weird he is

friends.name: Cali
friends.desc: Cali is a silly woman who says strange things but overall seems like a very sweet person. I have yet to warm up to Cali, I have a negative ascociation with them and a conversation she had with Jay that had made it uncomfortable to talk to cali for a while, but that has since faded!
friends.them:
+ Funny
~ Says some genuinely weird stuff sometimes
+ Very fun to talk to and joke around with
- Scary
- British ðŸ¤¢ðŸ¤¢ðŸ¤¢

friends.name: Lukas
friends.desc: Isaac's boyfriend, a trans autistic dude (why do I know so many of them). Used to be a good friend of mine who would be great support for anything I went through. Then that one friend group ruined my social life and I just can't be comfortable around Lukas or Isaac anymore, and I don't know why.
friends.them:
+ Has been a lot of help in the past.
- Seems very judgemental
- Scary, makes me uncomfortable for some reason, association with Isaac

friends.name: Alex
friends.desc: A silly guy with a deep voice and a love for zoomer humor. Very silly yet down to earth, swell dude. Hard to talk to, not very good at arguing, but it is what it is.
friends.them:
+ Has been a lot of help in the past.
- Sometimes humor can be too much
+ Open to talk to about anything really

friends.name: Owen
friends.desc: Owen was a good friend of mine from school, he then became very vocal about things, and became a part of a highschool friend group that severely fucked me over.
friends.them:
+ Funny
+ Has similar interests as me
- Possibly Transphobic
- Creates conflict
- Was a part of the group that fucked up my social life.

friends.name: Lake
friends.desc: A trans autistic dude constantly hyperfixated on transformers. Used to be my best friend, has definitely fallen out of that spot in the past few years. We had been friends through some rough highschool and even middle school events.
friends.them:
+ Has been a lot of help in the past.
- Seems more like a transformers wiki page than a friend

friends.name: Angelina
friends.desc: Canadian lady who plays roblox
friends.them:
+ Is just generally fun
- Not much more
- Takes part in and causes a lot of drama in the Canadian group.

friends.name: Teddy
friends.desc: One of the nicest dudes I know, super cool and fun. Always makes me feel better than any other wanker crew member. Not afraid to be himself, even when he's mocked for it
friends.them:
+ One of the only nice people in Wanker Crew
+ Makes me laugh, super nice to me
- Associated with other Wanker Crew members, not a negative for him, but he's bullied too much

friends.name: Isaac
friends.desc: Was the weird middle school kid who somehow managed to befriend a bunch of highschoolers. We've had a weird history. Bad events, good events(?), but I remain uncomfortable with him, mainly in person
friends.them:
- Isn't usually that nice to me
- Accelerated my mental decline by provoking me and my abusive ex (causing more problems for me)
- Acted jokingly sexual with me way too much when I wasn't comfortable with him
+ Funny and makes for good entertainment
- Has made fun of my interests, making me insecure
- Sometimes drops a lot of like, "affection" on me, as I'm trying to separate

friends.name: Miles
friends.desc: A silly goofball guy who likes being a gross and hilarious character. I don't know him that personally, and I don't care to, but he's fun and that's about all I can say about him
friends.them:
+ Really funny
+ Seems like a genuine dude at heart, never shows it
+ Never (genuinely) mean to me

friends.name: Max2
friends.desc: A dude who sends me funny things sometimes, likes old games and has offered to play some niche stuff together, I unfortunately have turned him down a lot though.
friends.them:
+ Very funny
+ Sends me memes once in a while
+ Easy to make jokes with

friends.name: Evan
friends.desc: A very confident and confrontational dude. He's very fun, but causes too much conflict and makes me feel very uncomfortable sometimes.
friends.them:
~ Is a fun friend sometimes
- Accelerated my mental decline by provoking me and my abusive ex
- Makes fun of my interests and projects once in a while
+ Is very funny and charismatic
+ Plays into alot of my jokes
- Is very confrontational and political, causes a lot of conflict

friends.name: Sasha
friends.desc: Just another silly guy, I don't care much for him, he's funny sometimes but his humor just isn't for me
friends.them:
- Mean to me
- Mean to Teddy often times
- Seemed homophobic for a while

friends.name: Louis
friends.desc: A funny guy who's just fun, nothing much more. Very chill, I don't know him personally or know much about him in general but he's there
friends.them:
- Doesn't interact with me much
+ Funny

friends.name: Aidan
friends.desc: A weirdo, hard to describe. Says strange things and is mean to everyone around him, but due to him being just so weird, it's funny and people enjoy him (as a character)
friends.them:
-Mean to me
- Probably homophobic
- Says weird stuff like Max, but much worse and genuine, instead of in character.
+ Entertaining, hard to take seriously

friends.name: Bishop
friends.desc: Bishop is a weirdo, who is just always been weird to me. Sometimes he'll say something like "I wanna say a word but Zander's here"
friends.them:
- Alluded to wanting to call me the f-slur
- Isn't nice to me at all
+ Is much nicer and funnier in person

friends.name: Noah
friends.desc: So called "Leader" of the Wanker Crew, overall dickhead narcissist. Not a fan. Called me faggot in Jackbox once, after a week of constantly making fun of me for being bi.
friends.them:
- Mean to me
- Mean to Teddy, who I really like
- Called me the f-slur in Jackbox, and not in any way that was really lighthearted or funny
